originalText.text: I took their 4 week business English course for my important meetings coming up. The setup is very professional; I got my handouts done proofread and speeches also. If you already have almost native speaker like fluency, but you want to polish up a little bit more to perfection, it will bring you to the next level.  You can make your own schedule. Nice staff and quick response. I will use the course next time I prepare for these kind of meetings.

originalText.text: This is an ideal place for ESL students who really want to improve their English. They have well-structured teaching schedules and they have several professional teachers come to help you. They also have a good short term test preparation program that can help you boost your scores. Wonderful program, amazing people, recommended it for every ESL students.

originalText.text: I recommended this school to my friend's kids. They made the kids read English articles and newspaper. They found learning English not boring yet fun. Affordable and convenient English online class you can enjoy at home.

originalText.text: I really enjoy the course with them. Mihee was my teacher and I just want to say she was really good teacher and she was very serious in her job.

originalText.text: "I used their editing service for proof-reading for my professional paper. Their service was fast and thorough. I would recommend it for any English service."
